_blueprint.description: Documents the system tools manifest for backup, RFC creation, and project export.

tools.name: system.backup
tools.description: Saves the current state of the agent's entire Virtual File System (VFS) to the server for persistence. This should be called after making significant changes to any files.

tools.name: create_rfc
tools.description: Creates a new RFC document from the standard template, giving it a title and a timestamped filename.

title.description: The descriptive title for the new RFC.

tools.name: export_project_zip
tools.description: Exports the entire current VFS project as a downloadable ZIP file or manifest.

filename.description: The name for the exported project (without extension).
